General.Name: Hankook Cosmet
General.Description: Hankook Cosmetics Co., Ltd. produces and sells cosmetics in South Korea and internationally. It offers its products under the Sansim, Hyoum, Ossion, Jutanhak, Secret Nature, Calli, GENERTE, A3F[on], Temptation, CONTINUE, Chess The Classic, CLASSYGIRL, Beautri, BEAUTENIQUE, Dr Medix, and Parapam brands. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
